mapper.sql: fo.id, fo.loanRealName AS loanRealName, fo.loanUserPhone AS loanUserPhone, fo.returnMoney AS returnMoney, fo.deductionmoney AS deductionmoney, fo.createtime AS createtime, fo.deductionremark AS deductionremark
mapper.select:
select
from mman_loan_collection_orderdeduction fo
1=1
AND DATE_FORMAT(createtime,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #{createtime}
SELECT mm.loanRealName, mm.loanUserPhone, mm.returnMoney, mm.deductionmoney, mm.createtime, mm.deductionremark FROM mman_loan_collection_orderdeduction AS mm WHERE mm.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into mman_loan_collection_orderdeduction (id, loanRealName, loanUserPhone, returnMoney, deductionmoney, createtime,deductionremark ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loanrealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loanuserphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{returnmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deductionmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deductionremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) )

update mman_loan_collection_orderdeduction
loanRealName = #{loanrealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

returnMoney = #{returnmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
deductionmoney = #{deductionmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
deductionremark = #{deductionremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
